title: Business Card, "Emily - Paris - Vienna"

tombstone.epitaph:
Business Card, "Emily - Paris - Vienna".
Letterpress in green ink on cream laid paper; letterpress on green paper board with black flocking. Gift of James Howard Fraser. 2000-68-158.
